titlepage.titleproper: Guide to Edwin Hale Lincoln, Sailing Vessels, Photographs1911

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Lincoln, Edwin Hale. Sailing Vessels. Photographs

address.addressline: Hanna Holborn Gray Special Collections Research Center

did.abstract: 46 platinum print photographs of sailing ships. Accompanied by handwritten descriptions of each vessel's origin and functions on verso. Also includes typescript index.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: The manuscript is open for research.

prefercite.head: Citation
prefercite.p: When quoting material from this collection, the preferred citation is: Lincoln, Edwin Hale. Sailing Vessels. Photographs, Crerar Ms 244, Hanna Holborn Gray Special Collections Research Center, University of Chicago Library

scopecontent.head: Scope Note
scopecontent.p: 46 platinum print photographs of sailing ships. Accompanied by handwritten descriptions of each vessel's origin and functions on verso. Also includes typescript index.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Resources
relatedmaterial.p: The following related resources are located in the Department of Special Collections:
